name: StepBar
description: Step progress bar indicating main steps and the current one

properties.label: Step List
properties.name: stepList
properties.caption: Value 1, Value 2, Value 3
properties.help: Specify a list of step names

properties.label: Current Step
properties.name: currentStep
properties.caption: Current step/phase
properties.help: Name of the current step to be highlighted (must exist in the step list)
